sourcesContent:
<template>
    <button @click = "deleteTask()"  class="deleteBtn">{{text}}></button>
</template>

<script>
    export default{
        name: 'Button',
        props: {
            text: String,
            color: String
        },
        methods: {
            deleteTask(){
                console.log('Task deleted')
            }
        }
    }
</script>
